Legal_Issue: Whether the respondent provided sufficient evidence of use of the trademark 'LE COLLEZIONI (TRADIZIONI) DI SUCCESSO' during the relevant three-year period
Evidence_Assessment: Affidavits, labels, garment sample, advertisements, sales figures exceeding $18 million were assessed as sufficient for some goods but not others
Burden_of_Proof: On registrant to prove use under Section 45 of the Trade-marks Act
Credibility_Factor: Supporting documentation including sales data and physical samples considered credible
Legal_Rule: Section 45 requires proof of use; Section 4 defines 'use'
Standard_of_Review: Reasonableness, unless new evidence materially affects findings
Procedural_Issue: Appeal under Section 56 of the Trade-marks Act
Grounds_for_Claim: Allegation of non-use of trademark in Canada
Outcome_on_Merits: Respondent met burden for certain goods; claim dismissed on merits
Procedural_Fairness_Assessment: Process followed statutory requirements; no unfairness identified
Key_Evidence_Considered: Affidavits, product labels, actual garment sample, advertising materials, sales data
Legal_Framework: Canadian trademark law, specifically Trade-marks Act provisions on use and registration
Applicant_Challenge: Challenged Registrar's finding that trademark was in use
Legal_Rule_Source: Section 45 and Section 4 of the Trade-marks Act
Standard_of_Proof: Preponderance of evidence showing trademark use in commerce
Defendant_Response: Provided affidavits, samples, ads, and sales records to demonstrate use
Evidence_Type: Documentary evidence, physical product sample, testimonial affidavits
Remedy_Requested: Cancellation of trademark registration for non-use
Outcome: Remedy denied; registration maintained for certain goods
Remedy_Sought: Removal of trademark from register due to non-use
Legal_Provision: Section 45, Section 4, Section 56 of the Trade-marks Act
Grounds_for_Inadmissibility_or_Allegatio: Non-use of trademark in Canada for a continuous three-year period
Applicable_Process: Section 45 proceeding followed by appeal under Section 56
Outcome_of_Review: No error found in Registrar's decision
